uvi.description:
usb: dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.250 by commit 4b7f4a0eb92bf37bea4cd838c7f83ea42823ca8b. For more details please see the references link.
